content: A trip to Taijiang County during the Sister's Meal Festival would indeed be a unique and memorable experience. It's always a good idea to plan ahead and book accommodations in advance as the festival is a very popular event and attracts many visitors from all over China and the world. Make sure to also bring warm clothing as the weather in April can be quite chilly at night. I hope you have a great trip and enjoy all the festivities that the Sister's Meal Festival and Guizhou province have to offer!
